quotes.name: Coco Chanel
quotes.text: Beauty is a ray of light in everyday grey.

quotes.name: Pat McGrath
quotes.text: Makeup artistry is a way to highlight your uniqueness.

quotes.name: Tadashi Shoji
quotes.text: By creating beauty, we create harmony that heals the soul.

quotes.name: Charlotte Tilbury
quotes.text: Fashion trends may change, but style is what lasts.

quotes.name: Est√©e Lauder
quotes.text: A perfect look reflects your inner confidence.

quotes.name: Lisa Eldridge
quotes.text: Makeup is an art of transformation that helps us express our inner world.
